title: Windows 7 AIO DUAL BOOT 18in1 ESD pt-BR Dec2015 {Generation2}
description:
* Windows 7 AIO DUAL BOOT 18in1 OEM ESD pt-BR Dec2015 {Generation2}


[ RELEASE INFO ]


* File: W7.AIO.OEM.ESD.Dec2015.pt-BR.iso
* Size: 5,82GB
* Format: Bootable ISO

* CRC32: 3b5fb71a
* MD5: 4e17bc9400d8bd11ec328a1a3c2c2da6
* SHA-1: 2956ca0e9cfa99b635c98627c78dc2cab16d6607

* Sources: 
* x86: dvd-677457 & dvd-677686
* x64: dvd-677358 & dvd-677668

* Language: pt-BR [ BRAZILIAN ]

[ CONTENTS ]

* Integrated / Pre-installed in Audit Mode:

* Internet Explorer 11
* .NET Framework 4.6.1 
* Important & Security Updates - 2015-12-08

* Setupcomplete / Post-install:

* KB890830
* Defender Updates
 
[ FEATURES ]

* DUAL boot & install.wim (ESD)
* UEFI supported for both 32 & 64bit
* install.wim(s) compressed to recovery format (install.esd)
* (Use attached Rufus USB-tool to make UEFI-bootable).
* Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset 10.0 (Microsoft DaRT)

[ EDITIONS INCLUDED ]
 
* 32bit:    
* Windows 7 Professional - - STD / DAZ / OEM
* Windows 7 Enterprise - - - STD / KMS / OEM
* Windows 7 Ultimate - - - - STD / DAZ / OEM
* 64bit
* Windows 7 Professional - - STD / DAZ / OEM
* Windows 7 Enterprise - - - STD / KMS / OEM
* Windows 7 Ultimate - - - - STD / DAZ / OEM

* STD = Standard installation
* DAZ = Activated by DAZ Loader
* KMS = Activated by KMSpico 	
* OEM (Original Equipment Manufacturer) will automatically 
* activate original version installed by Manufacturer.
* Pre-Activated index will auto-reboot to complete the activation.

* Screenshots:
[url]http://postimg.org/gallery/2z9d7akoc/[/url]

* Activators: DAZ Loader v2.2.2.0 + KMSPico v10.1.8.2 Portable Edition	 
( Potential False Positive Virus Alarm )

[ INSTALLATION & INFORMATION ]

* Create bootable USB (highly recommended) with Rufus,
* (attached) or burn to DVD-DL at slow speed.

[ CREDITS ]
* ashish.k & milrob for continued support & help with user questions!

* Hope you will enjoy this release.

* Regards,
* Generation2 @ KAT & TPB
